name: You Are DanganPervert
description:
Everyone lives in Harmony. The Ultimates  are coming to your school.  And you...are a gay pervert.

You play as a character  named Masa, who is secretly a gay pervert in a talentless high school.

All of a sudden, you bump into The Ultimate Detective, a thicc emo boy.

What will you do?  Find out by playing the game!
